review.employee-type: Head of Treasury and Investor Relations (Former Employee)
review.title: “Amazing start-up in the alternative energy space”
review.pros: Pros – Dynamic and young team with a can do attitude. During my time there the company went through an amazing growth with expansion into three countries. The company has an amazing business model.
review.cons: Cons – Aggressive growth with lots of business risk. The companies management has some very ambitious plans, where execution is key. Unfortunately top-management did a poor job with entering new markets, especially in Romania.
review.advice-to-management: Advice to Senior Management – Should do a better job with post merger integration
